record.title: MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--S. 2534, S. 2626, S. 2675, S. 2725, AND S. 2673
record.narrative:
MEASURES INDEFINITELY POSTPONED--S. 2534, S. 2626, S. 2675, S. 2725, AND S. 2673 -- (Senate - May 12, 2008)

[Page: S4046]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the following calendar numbers be indefinitely postponed en bloc: Calendar Nos. 677 to 680 and Calendar No. 696.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
